title: The Meanest Man in the World

sources.title: The Meanest Man In The World (1943)
The Meanest Man in the World (1943)
sources.description: Compassionate small-town lawyer Richard Clarke moves to New York City to seek his fortune, but is unsuccessful until he takes a friend's advice and tries to convince the world he's a ruthless heel. Suddenly he's the most popular lawyer in town -- but he could lose his fiancée. Watch on RetroFlix:  https://retroflix.org/the-meanest-man-in-the-world-1943/

metadata.Plot: Compassionate small-town lawyer Richard Clarke moves to New York City to seek his fortune, but is unsuccessful until he takes a friend's advice and tries to convince the world he's a ruthless heel. Suddenly he's the most popular lawyer in town -- but he could lose his fiancée.
metadata.Writer: George Seaton, Allan House, George M. Cohan
metadata.Actors: Jack Benny, Priscilla Lane, Eddie 'Rochester' Anderson
